@JoeBiden You're the jerk calling @realDonaldTrump a racist for restricting air travel from China and closing the borders! 
You were the piece of garbage tweeting gleefully about the impeachment trial while Trump took action YOU OPPOSED against Coronavirus & declaring a national emergency.
